title: Autofill are you stupid?
body: I have no idea why riot give this shiit auto fill to ranked game. they worry someone will stay forever in queue time and they will complain that it took so long? or you wanna make ppl rage and toxic because they didnt get the role they wanted and riot jsut gave that role for some shiiter to fail the ranked game. why they wanna ppl to pick the role while you will give it to someone else? They keep talking "we will make this game better" . S H I T

replies.body: I partly agree with the toxic part, since its been out a few times now i have run into players not intending to play support and getting support and feeding because they didn't want to play it or just simply quitting, but on the other note its becoming harder and harder to find support mains, especially in the lower elo because people don't want to play a position that they can't trust themselves to carry in. I think it helps find matches a lot faster and maybe helps people learn new roles but i do agree that it shouldn't so much be in ranked pick because people are going to ranked to play there best position and win but can't do that when they're say a mid main and get handed support.
